fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose someone to stabilize.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Stabilization lasts for 2 nights. (*The night you perform the action, and the night after.*)
- A stabilized target, if attacked by a basic or powerful attack, will "Bleed Out" over the course of 2 days. (*Ex: Deodat attacked n1 but is stabilized. Deodat now dies at the end of n3.*)
- Your target, if stabilized successfully, will know they were attacked and healed, but not that they were stabilized.
- A bleeding-out target cannot speak.
- If the bleeding-out target is healed, they will return to normal.
